title: Early Childhood: Tantrums
headline: Explore the psychology behind childhood tantrums and learn how to handle them in this free online childcare course.
description: This course examines children’s tantrums and explains how to deal with them in an effective manner. We provide facts and figures to explain the underlying causes of juvenile tantrums and meltdowns. We then provide proven strategies that parents and teachers can employ to help a child cope with ‘big feelings’. Sign up for this childcare course to learn how to calm down the children in your care and restore peace to the classroom and home.

courseDescription:
Are you faced with a child who regularly throws tantrums and struggles to control their emotions? If so, this course suits your needs as we discuss the psychology behind such fits of anger encountered during early childhood to help you guide the children around you towards better self-control and mental health, thus improving both your and their lives. The course begins with some basic information on tantrums and their causes. We also provide some useful tips and techniques that parents and childcare providers can use to help children cope with anger issues.

Do you want an effective strategy for dealing with a child with tantrums? We lay out a variety of approaches that have proven to help adults cope with children who can’t control their emotions. We discuss the importance of consistency, discipline and good role modelling when it comes to helping children in your care acquire the tools they need to deal with their emotional issues.

Does it feel like you are always yelling at the children around you? We explain how a cool and calm approach can help you deal with a child with anger issues. Moving past practical childcare, we also show you how to identify and properly address some serious mental health issues that could drive childhood anger issues. Tantrums can be frustrating for adults but there are many useful ways to deal with them and improve everyone’s life. Sign up for this childcare course to understand the causes of childhood tantrums and learn how to handle them effectively to restore peace and calm to both the child and their environment.
